## ScriptHost.onIdleChange() method

Registers a listener callback that shall be invoked whenever the idle status changes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onIdleChange(callback: (idle: boolean) => void): () => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | (idle: boolean) =&gt; void | The callback that shall be invoked whenever the idle status changes |

<b>Returns:</b>

() =&gt; void

A callback that shall be invoked to stop listening
